question: 利く
sourceMnemonic: You know the kanji means <kanji>profit</kanji>. When you make it into a verb, though, it means <vocabulary>to work well</vocabulary>. If you think about it, when something works well it makes you a profit.
sourceReadingMnemonic: What works so well? Your special <reading>key</reading> (<ja>き</ja>) that can unlock anyone and anything's potential. Imagine putting it into a key slot in someone's back. Someone who's a good for nothing can't-do-anything is now an effective member of society! Go around using your key on other non-effective things and show them that anything is possible!
